attributes.action: Chief Scientific Officer Sir Patrick Vallance, needs to be removed from office.
attributes.additional_details: Because his conflict of interest, clouds his judgment. Having shares in a vaccine company.
attributes.background: Chief Scientific Officer Sir Patrick Vallance, has a conflict of interest. Can not advise the government on health issues, because of this!

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.
